title: Dental Hygiene Leadership Legislation and Health Policy Advocacy Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Health Policies, Practical Experience in Dental Hygiene, Fundamental Knowledge of Leadership Theories
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course using smartphone-based VR simulations. Monitors learning effectiveness through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners analyze key elements of legislative processes in dental hygiene to acquire the ability to draft policy memos.
Learners demonstrate the ability to apply stakeholder negotiation and lobbying strategies in a VR simulation environment.
Learners design effective advocacy campaigns for community health policies and produce presentation materials.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
